title: Ramayan Research Council: Mission and Vision
author: RRC Editorial
excerpt: An overview of the council's mission to preserve and share India's cultural heritage through research and outreach.
content: The Ramayan Research Council is a registered trust focused on preserving cultural values through research, publications, and community engagement. This post summarizes our mission, vision, and long-term goals.

title: Sita Sthapna Initiative in Sitamarhi
author: RRC Editorial
excerpt: Highlights from ongoing efforts to develop the Sita temple area and promote pilgrimage tourism.
content: The council continues its efforts in Sitamarhi (Bihar) to strengthen pilgrimage infrastructure and promote cultural awareness around the Sita temple area.

title: Ram Lalla Book Project: Progress Update
author: RRC Editorial
excerpt: Updates on the research and publication work behind the Ram Lalla book project.
content: The book project documents decades of historical and cultural context around the Ram Lalla temple movement. This update shares current milestones and publication plans.
